scripts.test:objc3c:lane-e: node scripts/node/run_npm_sequence.js test:objc3c:lane-e test:objc3c test:objc3c:diagnostics-replay-proof test:objc3c:parser-replay-proof test:objc3c:parser-ast-extraction test:objc3c:sema-pass-manager-diagnostics-bus test:objc3c:driver-shell-split test:objc3c:lexer-extraction-token-contract test:objc3c:lexer-parity test:objc3c:perf-budget test:objc3c:lowering-regression test:objc3c:lowering-replay-proof test:objc3c:typed-abi-replay-proof test:objc3c:execution-smoke test:objc3c:execution-replay-proof
scripts.test:objc3c:full: npm run test:objc3c && npm run test:objc3c:matrix && npm run test:objc3c:negative-expectations
scripts.check:compiler-closeout:m137: python scripts/check_m137_lexer_contract.py && npm run test:objc3c:lexer-extraction-token-contract && npm run test:objc3c:lexer-parity && python scripts/spec_lint.py --glob "docs/contracts/lexer_token_contract_expectations.md"
scripts.check:compiler-closeout:m138: python scripts/check_m138_parser_ast_contract.py && npm run test:objc3c:parser-extraction-ast-builder-contract && npm run test:objc3c:parser-ast-extraction && python scripts/spec_lint.py --glob "docs/contracts/parser_ast_contract_expectations.md"
scripts.check:compiler-closeout:m140: python scripts/check_m140_frontend_library_boundary_contract.py && npm run test:objc3c:m140-boundary-contract && python scripts/spec_lint.py --glob "docs/contracts/frontend_library_boundary_expectations.md"
scripts.test:objc3c:m145-direct-llvm-matrix:lane: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File scripts/check_conformance_suite.ps1 && npm run test:objc3c:perf-budget
scripts.check:objc3c:m224-integration-release-re: npm run test:objc3c:m222-compatibility-migration && npm run check:objc3c:library-cli-parity:golden && python -m pytest tests/tooling/test_objc3c_m224_frontend_release_contract.py tests/tooling/test_objc3c_m224_sema_release_contract.py tests/tooling/test_objc3c_m224_lowering_release_contract.py tests/tooling/test_objc3c_m224_integration_release_contract.py -q
scripts.check:compiler-closeout:m141: python scripts/check_m141_cmake_target_topology_contract.py && npm run test:objc3c:m141-target-topology && python scripts/spec_lint.py --glob "docs/contracts/cmake_target_linkage_topology_expectations.md"
scripts.check:compiler-closeout:m142: python scripts/check_m142_frontend_lowering_parity_contract.py && npm run test:objc3c:m142-lowering-parity && python scripts/spec_lint.py --glob "docs/contracts/frontend_lowering_parity_expectations.md"
scripts.check:compiler-closeout:m143: python scripts/check_m143_artifact_tmp_governance_contract.py && npm run test:objc3c:m143-artifact-governance && python scripts/spec_lint.py --glob "docs/contracts/artifact_tmp_governance_expectations.md"
scripts.check:compiler-closeout:m145: python scripts/check_m145_direct_llvm_matrix_contract.py && npm run test:objc3c:m145-direct-llvm-matrix && npm run test:objc3c:m145-direct-llvm-matrix:lane-d && python scripts/spec_lint.py --glob "docs/contracts/direct_llvm_emission_expectations.md"
scripts.check:release-scale-foundation:w1:strict: python scripts/spec_lint.py && python scripts/check_issue_checkbox_drift.py && npm run check:activation-seed-hardening:w1:strict
scripts.check:governance-annualization:m07:stric: python scripts/spec_lint.py && python scripts/check_governance_annualization.py --input tests/tooling/fixtures/governance_annualization/baseline_ok.json --format markdown && python scripts/check_issue_checkbox_drift.py
scripts.check:governance-annualization:m08:stric: python scripts/spec_lint.py && python scripts/check_governance_annualization.py --input tests/tooling/fixtures/governance_annualization/baseline_ok.json --format markdown && python scripts/check_issue_checkbox_drift.py

scripts.check:task-hygiene: node scripts/node/run_npm_sequence.js check:planning-hygiene check:compiler-closeout:m135 check:compiler-closeout:m137 check:compiler-closeout:m138 check:compiler-closeout:m139 check:compiler-closeout:m140 check:compiler-closeout:m141 check:compiler-closeout:m142 check:compiler-closeout:m143 check:compiler-closeout:m144 check:compiler-closeout:m145 check:compiler-closeout:m153 check:catalog-status-integrity check:catalog-status-metadata check:open-blocker-audit:repo-root:fixtures extract:open-issues check:issue-drift
